title: Here begynneth a lytel treatyse called the dysputacyon or co[m]playnt of the herte thorughe perced with the lokynge of the eye
author: Map, Walter, fl. 1200.
publisher: In Fletestrete at ye sygne of the sonne, by Wynkyn de Worde,
notes: A translation of "Le debat du cuer et de l'oeil", an adaptation of a Latin poem attributed to Walter Map (STC).
Printer's name and address from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
